response: * David Drew (politician) (born 1952), British politician and member of Parliament, current vice chairman of Forest Green Rovers
* David Drew (dancer) (1938–2015), English ballet dancer and member of the Royal Ballet
* David Drew (music critic) (1930–2009), British musicologist and editor
* David Drew (umpire) (1919–1976), South African cricket umpire

Thanks to the efforts of David Drew, a dancer with the Royal Ballet for over 50 years, the ballet was revived in 2014 by the Birmingham Royal Ballet, under the direction of Gillian Lynne, a member of the original cast.
